attributes.action: national anthem/Oath of Allegiance to be said in all schools in the UK every morning
attributes.additional_details:
The current public schools have become so PC in the last few years they seem to forget they are British. We need to re-ignite our passion and our love for our country and it is through our schools this can be achieved.

I suggest that in all schools, every class, at the beginning of the day, the pupils recite either the National Anthem, or the Oath of Allegiance to Instill and enshrine National Pride in our school children
